sub_title: Senior Finance Specialist at SAP, FCCA
summary:
Goals: project management included financial analysis and commercial development

Direct experience with trading business, supply chain, auditing firm and financial reporting. 

Specialties: 
	Agile and self-motivated in learning, multi-task ability and teamwork spirit
	Understanding US GAAP and IFRS, internal & external auditing experiences
	Familiar with finance processes, interested in process improving
	Acquaintance of withholding tax and global licensing cases
	Knowledge about financial risk management

Frequent user of Word, Excel(VBA), PowerPoint, Photoshop, C++,etc.
